Title: Title
Include Storage Path data setup in Optio: Include Storage Path data setup in Options/Storage
Include Site Enabled settings from Optio: Include Site Enabled settings from Option/Scrappers
Selected Sites includes scenes for sites: Selected Sites includes scenes for sites enabled in Options/Scrapers. All sites does not filter based on sites.
Only includes scenes matching the Saved: Only includes scenes matching the Saved Search criteria. Applys to the Export function, not the Import
Include the main scene data, eg title, s: Include the main scene data, eg title, site, cast, tags, filenames, images, favorites, star ratings, etc
Include Cuepoint data you have entered f: Include Cuepoint data you have entered for a scene
Include your history of watching scenes: Include your history of watching scenes
Include scene edit data. Edits allows XB: Include scene edit data. Edits allows XBVR to reapply your changes to scene data. These would be lost if a scene is rescraped
Include details of files matched to a sc: Include details of files matched to a scene
Select a file to upload and import: Select a file to upload and import
New/Overwrite will overwite existing dat: New/Overwrite will overwite existing data as well as add new records, New will only add new records, existing data is not changed
Generating the data for a large number o: Generating the data for a large number of scenes is time consuming, montior progress in the status messages in the top right of the browser
You should exclude Studios from your Cus: You should exclude Studios from your Custom list (scrapers.json) if sharing data with others
Create a custom scene for this file: Create a custom scene for this file
If blank a Scene Id will be generated bu: If blank a Scene Id will be generated but cannot be changed later
Optional: select one or more words to ta: Optional: select one or more words to target searching to a specific field
Defaults date range to the last week. No: Defaults date range to the last week. Note:must match yyyy-mm-dd, include leading zeros
Restart XBVR to load new Sties: Restart XBVR to load new Sties
Name: Name
Enter the Url to Studio Scene List: Enter the Url to Studio Scene List
Allows the entry of Actor Height/Weight: Allows the entry of Actor Height/Weight in Imperial measurements
Scrape Actor details from sites after ru: Scrape Actor details from sites after running a Scene Scrape, otherwise run manually
Scrape Site Actors after Scene Scrape: Scrape Site Actors after Scene Scrape
Scrape Actor Details from XBVR Sites: Scrape Actor Details from XBVR Sites
Enter a StashApi key to enable: Enter a StashApi key to enable
Press o/left arrow to page back, p/right: Press o/left arrow to page back, p/right arrow to page forward
Remove Cast from Aka Group. Select the A: Remove Cast from Aka Group. Select the Aka group and Actors to remove in the Cast Filter
Add Cast to Aka Group. Select the Aka gr: Add Cast to Aka Group. Select the Aka group and Actors to add in the Cast Filter
Allows searching a variety of attributes: Allows searching a variety of attributes such as: Possible Aka actors, Cup Size, Eye/Hair Color, Has Tattoo, Has Piercing, Breast Type, Nationailty, Ethnicity, Aka, Has Images
New Aka Group. Select 2 or more actors i: New Aka Group. Select 2 or more actors in the Cast filter
Select the Aka Group to delete in the Ca: Select the Aka Group to delete in the Cast Filter
Only required when troubleshooting searc: Only required when troubleshooting search issues, this will enable a Tab in the Scene Details to display what search fields exist and their values for a scene
Occasionaly test uploading your export b: Occasionaly test uploading your export bundles. Browser memory constraints may cause problems restoring large exports. Use this function to test if your browser can load an export.
Only the first page of scenes will be sc: Only the first page of scenes will be scraped
Leave blank, unless you want to link sce: Leave blank, unless you want to link scenes from the new custom site to scenes on an existing studio site, e.g. VRHush on SLR or VRPorn to the main VRHush site
Days to wait after the release date, bef: Days to wait after the release date, before linking. Useful where the main site releases after SLR/VRPorn/POVR, eg LethalHardcore
Number of days to keep re-linking scenes: Number of days to keep re-linking scenes after the release date
Do not link scenes prior to the specifie: Do not link scenes prior to the specified date.  The quality of metadata of older scenes is often poor and causes mismatches
The number of days prior to the release: The number of days prior to the release date to match, eg if the scene release date is 23/05/2023 and the days prior is 3, it will search >= 20/05/2023. If days prior and after are 0, the range is not used
The number of days after the release dat: The number of days after the release date to match, eg if the scene release date is 23/05/2023 and the days after is 3, it will search <= 23/05/2023. Usually set to 0. If days prior and after are 0, the range is not used
Scenes from Alternate Sites will be matc: Scenes from Alternate Sites will be matched after Scene Scraping
If a file is not matched to a scene, the: If a file is not matched to a scene, then try scenes from Alternate Sites
When filtering for Scenes with Scripts o: When filtering for Scenes with Scripts or sorting by Script Published Date, scenes from Alternate Sites will be included. Note: Slows these queries
Limit scraping to newest scenes on the w: Limit scraping to newest scenes on the website. Turn off if you are missing scenes.
Highlights this studio in the scene view: Highlights this studio in the scene view and includes scenes in the "Has subscription" attribute filter
